column5: Hi all,  headed back down the road to Eagle lake for a short late afternoon session which did not disappoint. The bite was good ten days ago and even better this time around. Got enough for a fish fry each. all the action from 15' to 13' FOW. Jigs and minnows with 6 inches of ice.  Happy Xmas to you all, thanks to Roy and all the admins for the unenviable task of keeping this place together and avoiding world war III on a regular basis.   Tight lines and may Santa be kind   Simon.
Simon, ,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, LOL  Lucky blok you are.
Thanks Simon  for your kind words as well as all of the trips you share with us.   Merry Christmas   Art
Awesome!  Thanx for the video.  Those are some nice wallys.  Only ice here in Niagara is in my wife's Caesar!

Thanks again for sharing Simon. While I'm envious of your easy access to ice fishing and fresh walleye, as a senior, I'm not a fan of cold weather any more. Weather forecast for Ottawa area tomorrow is +16.   I might wash my truck in the lane way tomorrow just to set a new date record.
If I had walleye fishing like that close to home, I wouldn't be home much.  Nice Simon!
Great job Simon, looks like a blast.
